Chicago is famous for its hot dogs, which are typically served with mustard, onions, relish, tomato wedges, pickle spear, and a dash of celery salt on a steamed poppy seed bun.

Chicago is famous for its hot dogs, which are typically served with yellow mustard, chopped white onions, bright green sweet pickle relish, a dill pickle spear, tomato slices or wedges, pickled sport peppers and a dash of celery salt.
